00021 #include "../DelegateN/DelegateBase.hpp"

00023 namespace DL 
00024   {
00028   template < class ReturnType , 
00029        class Param1     
00030      >
00031   class Functor1 : public DelegateBase 
00032   {
00033   ReturnType (*m_function)(Param1);
00034   Param1 m_val1;
00035   Functor1(){}
00036   public:
00037   Functor1(ReturnType (*function)(Param1),
00038     Param1 val1 = Param1()):
00039     m_function(function),m_val1(val1)
00040     {}
00041   virtual ~Functor1(){}
00042   void operator()()
00043   {
00044     (*m_function)(m_val1);
00045   }
00046   ReturnType operator()(Param1 val1)
00047   {
00048    return (*m_function)(val1);
00049   }
00050   void Invoke()
00051   {
00052     (*m_function)(m_val1);
00053   }
00054   ReturnType Invoke(Param1 val1)
00055   {
00056    return (*m_function)(val1);
00057   }
00058   };
00059   
00060   //######################################################################################################
00061   template < class ReturnType , class Param1  >
00062   DelegateObj create_delegate( ReturnType(*Meth)(Param1), Param1 & param1 )
00063   {
00064     return DelegateObj(new Functor1<ReturnType,Param1>(Meth,param1));
00065   }
00066 } // namespace DL
